mapper.select: select * from Message where toId=#{toId} and msgType='Question' and retMsgId=-1 order by sendTime desc
select * from Message where fromId=#{fromId} and msgType='Question' and retMsgId=-1 order by sendTime desc
select * from Message where id=#{id} or retMsgId=#{id}
select * from Message where toId=#{toId} and msgType='Private'
select * from Message where fromId=#{toId} and msgType in ('Private', 'Broadcast')
mapper.insert: insert into Message(status, title, content, fromId, toId, msgType, retMsgId) values(#{status},#{title},#{content},#{from},#{to},#{type},#{retMsgId})
mapper.update: update Message set status=#{status} where id=#{id}
